derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: shortening of idropesie, earlier form of obsolete hydropsy, via Old French and Latin from Greek hudrōps 'dropsy', from hudōr 'water'
1930s: slang, elaborated form of slang drop 'a bribe'

means.word_mean: 1. swelling from excessive accumulation of serous fluid in tissue
